headline: Cure Hydration Launches in Ulta Beauty Stores, Expanding Access to Ingestible Wellness
summary: Female-Founded Brand Brings Clean, Science-Backed Hydration to the Beauty Aisle This OctoberNew York, USA, Oct. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cure Hydration, the leading premium, plant-based hydration brand known for its clean, science-backed electrolyte formulas, today announced its nationwide launch in Ulta Beauty. With this debut, Cure brings its innovative ingestible wellness formulas to Ulta Beauty, bridging beauty and functional health and meeting the growing need for beauty-from-within sol
